Windlord:

"Wait me!!!! I'm going with you" said the male and flew followed him


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Yggdrasil: I sure hope you can take action with me when we strike at
> the Tripreds!
> 
> He then headed out and slowly lumbered his way towards the Maximal 
Base.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> > : : Kup : :
> > 
> > Kup: Yes. Also inform Rodimus that i will be staying here with 
Quet
> and Grimlock for a while. Good bye, friend.
> > 
> > 
> > Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > Yggdrasil would have smiled had he had a mouth instead of the
> > faceplate traditionnal to his lineage.
> > 
> > Yggdrasil: Thanks, my friend... Before I can go though, I owe
> > something to Rodimus. I also want to learn more about the Tripreds
> > here, and possibly stage a raid against them. For now, I'll go 
back to
> > base.
> > 
> > He walks away slowly, trnasforming to oak-fiend mode. Then, he 
stops.
> > 
> > Yggdrasil: Oh yeah, what was it you wanted me to report back? 
That the
> > Ark was secure?
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> > > : : Kup : :
> > > 
> > > Kup: I'm not angry, lad. We fight these Beast Wars here on 
Earth,
> > while our governments are destroyed and our leaders dead. I hope 
you
> > are successful in taking Cybertron back from the Tripredacus, so 
that
> > we have a home to return to and so this war is not in vain.
> > > 
> > > 
> > > Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > > Yggdrasil turned around and faced Kup.
> > > 
> > > Yggdrasil: There is a war greater than this one. I was ordered 
to
> > > bring Talos back with me, but he has been dead for a long time 
now.
> > > Seeing Optimus here made me think... I must do what I can to 
dig those
> > > damned Tripredacus out of our world! If someone has to rise up 
against
> > > them, then I am ready to follow, and if no one else is up for 
the
> > > task, then I will go alone. Maybe I will die there, but at 
least, I'll
> > > do this in his memory!
> > > 
> > > He pointed at Prime, knowing that he might not be as good a 
leader as
> > > he had been, but at least, he would try.
> > > 
> > > Yggdrasil: Don't be mad at me, Kup. I just want you guys to 
have a
> > > home where to go when you're done slaggin' those predafreaks!
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> > > > : : Kup : :
> > > > 
> > > > This shocked Kup back to reality.
> > > > 
> > > > Kup: Leave the planet? Why?
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > > > By that time, Yggdrasil had lost any sense of prestige that 
was
> > > > befitting of his rank. He just stood there in utter 
amazament. In
> > > > front of him was Optimus Prime, the venerable Autobot, the 
ideal to
> > > > attain, the fabled leader, but most of all, the grandfather 
he never
> > > > had the chance to meet.
> > > > 
> > > > He raised a hand and passed it on the huge head of his 
ancestor. He
> > > > felt nostalgic, thinking of Pumpskin, who had fallen in the 
hands of
> > > > the Preds, the Tripredacus, who had conquered his homeland, 
and
> of the
> > > > Survivors, trying to build a semblant of resistance on Earth. 
His
> > > > fists clenched and emotion swirled in his mind. He hated the
> Predacons
> > > > for their constant tugs on the Pax Cybertronia, but he was now
> > > > loathing against the Tripredacus. Something had to be done...
> > > > 
> > > > Yggdrasil: I will have to go, Kup. Maybe not now, but my duty
> tells me
> > > > I'll have to leave this planet.
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen 
<roborick007@y...>
> wrote:
> > > > > : : Kup : :
> > > > > 
> > > > > Kup liked how this Gromlock spoke. Educated, advanced. It 
was much
> > > > more easy to understand him now.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Kup: I'd like to hear them all...
> > > > > 
> > > > > Kup's attention was stolen from Grimlock when Kup realized 
just
> > > > where they were in the Ark.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Kup looks up at the center command seat. There, in stasis, 
was
> > > > Optimus Prime.
> > > > > 
> > > > > 
> > > > > foxmanroar1@a... wrote:
> > > > > In a message dated 6/18/2003 12:56:58 PM Eastern Daylight 
Time,
> > > > roborick007@y... writes:
> > > > > 
> > > > > : : Kup : :
> > > > > Kup follows the others into the Ark. He stays next to 
Grimlock.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Kup: So old friend, I'm sure we have a lot to catch up on.
> > > > > 
> > > > > 
> > > > > 
> > > > > Grimlock Looked over at him, much, you would never beleive 
the
> > > > paradise we left to ensure your future... My friend this time 
i have
> > > > many stories i would like to tell you.
